naslov: Najam, kuća, Zagreb, Podsljeme, Šestinski vrh, Šestine, 400 m2 (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Samostojeća obiteljska kuća na tri etaže površine 400 m2, Šestine. U suterenu se nalazi kotlovnica, vešeraj i pomoćne prostorije. U prizemlju je opremljena kuhinja s ostavom, veliki dnevni boravak sa kaminom i izlazom na vrt, blagovaona i toalet. Na katu se nalaze kupaonica, dvije garderobe i četiri spavaće sobe. Dvije sobe imaju izlaz na balkon, a glavna ima još i svoju kupaonicu. Kuća ima plinsko centralno grijanje odvojeno za svaku etažu, video portafone, klima uređaj u svakoj sobi, zidani sef, mogućnost brzog interneta, instalaciju za ugradnju alarma, daljinsko otvaranje kolnog ulaza. U sklopu kuće se nalaze dvije garaže u koju se mogu parkirati ukupno četiri vozila, a ispred garaža je prostor za još dva vozila. Renovirana 2024. godine, iznajmljuje se nenamještena. Kuća ima okućnicu od 700 m2, na kojoj je voćnjak i velika terasa sa vrtnim roštiljem i pripremom za izgradnju bazena. Stanica autobusa je stotinjak metara od kuće. Ugovor za najam se sklapa na minimalno godinu dana. Režijski troškovi nisu uključeni u cijenu najma. Polog: u visini jedne mjesečne najamnine. U skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti osobnih podataka i zaštite vlasnika nekretnina od dolaska nepoznatih osoba, potencijalni kupci, najmoprimci i zakupnici će dobiti podatke o nekretnini tek nakon potpisivanja prezentacijskog lista ili ugovora o posredovanju. Za sva dodatna pitanja stojimo na raspolaganju putem emaila WhatsApp-a, Viber-a ili SMS-a. Detached family house on three floors, 400 m2, Šestine. In the basement there is a boiler room, a laundry room and auxiliary rooms. On the ground floor there is an equipped kitchen with a pantry, a large living room with a fireplace and access to the garden, a dining room and a toilet. On the first floor there is a bathroom, two wardrobes and four bedrooms. Two rooms have access to the balcony, and the main one also has its own bathroom. The house has separate gas central heating for each floor, video intercoms, air conditioning in each room, a safe, the possibility of high-speed Internet, alarm, remote opening of the yard fence. Within the house there are two garages for a total of four vehicles and in front of the garage there is space for two more vehicles. Renovated in 2024, for rent unfurnished. The house has a garden of 700 m2, on which there is an orchard and a large terrace with a garden grill and preparation for the construction of a swimming pool. The bus stop is about a hundred meters from the house. Agency commission for the lessee: ONE MONT RENT (no VAT) The rental contract will be concluded for a minimum of one year. Overhead costs are not included in the rental price. Deposit: in the amount of one month's rent. In accordance with the Law on the Protection of Personal Data, as well as the protection of real estate owners against the arrival of unknown persons, potential buyers, tenants will receive information about the real estate only after signing the presentation sheet or mediation agreement. For any additional questions, we are available via email, WhatsApp, Viber or SMS.
